TestDescription.name: ExtJS charts.swf cross site scripting
TestDescription.Description: The ExtJS JavaScript framework that is shipped with TYPO3 also delivers a flash file to show charts. This file is susceptible to cross site scripting (XSS). This vulnerability can be exploited without any authentication.
TestDescription.Impact: Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them. An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user. It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Update to TYPO3 versions 4.5.34, 4.7.19, 6.0.14, 6.1.9 or 6.2.3 that fix the problem described or delete the file typo3/contrib/extjs/resources/charts.swf as it is not used by TYPO3 at all.

Reference.database: TYPO3-CORE-SA-2014-001: Multiple Vulnerabilities in TYPO3 CMS
